content: pattern puddle slime from „slime rancher by yabase s crochet world yabase crochet@gmail com materials - felt yarn or black safety eyes 8 or 9 mm - yarn in the colors light blue and pink i used schachenmayer catania originals with a 2 or 2 5 mm hook but feel free to use any yarn and blue tone with the matching hook size you have in your yarn stash - stuffing scicors needle notes this is my first pattern so it s of course not perfect if you find any mistakes or have difficulties with any parts feel free to comment or send me a message or an email and thank you for your interest in this pattern but enough chattering be brave be bold and stay wiggly abbrevations -> you can use invisible increases first stitch of the increase is using only front loop and the second one increase increase through both loops and invisible decreases use decrease decrease front loops only chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet treble_crochet - treble_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet * * repeat - number of stitches slip_stitch - slip_stitch body 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet 6 2 6 increase 12 3 *1 single_crochet 1 increase * 18 4 1 round single_crochet 18 5 *2 single_crochet 1 increase * 24 6 1 round single_crochet 24 7 *3 single_crochet increase * 30 8 *4 single_crochet increase * 36 9-11 3 rounds single_crochet 36 -> if you re using safety eyes place them now between round 7 and 8 12 *5 single_crochet increase * work only in the front loops 42 13 *6 single_crochet increase * 48 14 *3 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet in the same stitch 2 double_crochet * 54 don t worry if it does not matches with the count of stitches just crochet it along with 1 or 2 stitches as a new round so the 6 waves build up 1 half_double_crochet 1 slip_stitch fasten_off the bottom 1 magic_ring with 6 single_crochet 6 2 increase all 12 3 *1 single_crochet increase * 18 4 *2 single_crochet increase * 24 5 *3 single_crochet increase * 30 6 * 4 single_crochet increase * 36 7 *5 single_crochet increase * 42 8 *6 single_crochet increase * 48 the two parts 9 *3 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet in the same stitch 2 double_crochet * 54 1hdc 1 slip_stitch don t fasten_off -> crochet the bottom part directly on the other part put the hook through both stitches then crochet in the curves slip_stitch the rest normal single_crochet - > it s not important where exactly you re going to slip_stitch and single_crochet just make sure all the treble_crochet from the bottom part lay with the treble_crochet of the body -> don t forget to stuff it after probably the half way trrough -> important notes on next page -> end with a slip_stitch and fasten_off leaving a long tail if you finished the stuffing but don t stuff too much only a little
